realizacje.title: Projects
realizacje.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive projects in the field of steel construction and welding
realizacje.noResults: No projects in the selected category

projects.title: Industrial Hall Steel Structure
projects.description: Comprehensive steel structure realization for a production facility with 5000m¬≤ area
projects.challenge: The client needed a 5000m¬≤ building with large column-free spans for flexible production space organization. Fast completion and minimal maintenance costs were required.
projects.solution: We designed and built a steel structure with 30m span truss girders. We used high-grade S355 steel, allowing for cross-section optimization. Project completed in 4 months.

projects.title: Bridge Structure Welding
projects.description: Welding of road bridge elements with certified welding procedures
projects.challenge: The railway bridge required welding according to the strictest railway standards. Every weld had to be fully documented and tested with non-destructive methods.
projects.solution: We applied certified WPS welding procedures according to EN ISO 15614. Welding was performed using MAG and SAW methods. All welds passed ultrasonic and radiographic testing.

projects.title: Production Line Modernization
projects.description: Reconstruction and modernization of steel structures in an automotive production line
projects.challenge: The existing production line required modernization without production shutdown. Steel structures were overloaded and needed reinforcement.
projects.solution: We developed a weekend work schedule. We reinforced existing structures with additional purlins and bracing. We replaced the most worn elements.

projects.title: Steel Tower Construction
projects.description: Design and construction of a 45m high telecommunication tower steel structure
projects.challenge: Telecommunication tower construction in difficult mountain terrain. Required wind resistance up to 200 km/h and assembly without heavy cranes.
projects.solution: We designed a lattice structure from segments assembled by helicopter. We used high-strength bolted connections for easy assembly.

projects.title: Machine Parts Welding
projects.description: Precision welding of industrial machine parts using TIG and MIG methods
projects.challenge: Machine parts required welding with ¬±0.5mm tolerance. Materials included high-alloy steels and aluminum.
projects.solution: We used TIG welding with digital parameter control. Each element underwent 3D measurements and quality control.

projects.title: Steel Platform Construction
projects.description: Construction of multi-level steel platforms for a logistics center
projects.challenge: The logistics center needed a 3-level work platform with high load capacity and an evacuation staircase system.
projects.solution: We designed a modular steel structure from trusses. The system allows for easy future expansion.

projects.title: Plant Steel Structure Renovation
projects.description: Comprehensive renovation and reinforcement of existing industrial building steel structure
projects.challenge: The 40-year-old structure showed signs of corrosion and material fatigue. The building had to remain in use during renovation.
projects.solution: We conducted a detailed inventory. We replaced corroded elements, reinforced nodes, and applied an anti-corrosion system.

projects.title: Loading Ramp Construction
projects.description: Design and construction of loading ramps for a high-bay warehouse
projects.challenge: The warehouse required 6 loading stations with hydraulic ramps and a safety system.
projects.solution: We designed and built steel ramps with hydraulic platforms. The system was integrated with warehouse automation.

projects.title: Industrial Tank Welding
projects.description: Welding of pressure vessels according to AD 2000 and EN 13445 standards
projects.challenge: Pressure vessels for the chemical industry required certification according to PED Directive and 100% non-destructive testing of welds.
projects.solution: We used SAW welding with parameter control. All welds passed X-ray testing. Documentation compliant with PED.

oFirmie.title: About Us
oFirmie.subtitle: Discover the story of SteelFlow Systems - from the first welding sparks to constructions that shape the future
oFirmie.storySubtitle: Discover an interactive journey through 14 years of passion, work and growth. From the first welder to a modern company.
oFirmie.endSubtitle: But this is just the beginning of our journey together. Maybe your project will be the next chapter?

chapters.title: First steps
chapters.description: It all started with working at dad's company after school. Summer holidays, sweat, welding sparks and first experience with steel structures.

chapters.title: School graduation
chapters.description: Construction technical school completed. Diploma in pocket, welding certificates in hand. Time for real challenges!

chapters.title: Netherlands - learning from the best
chapters.description: Trip to the Netherlands. Working on bridge and offshore platform construction. I learned precision, European standards and... some Dutch!

chapters.title: Switzerland - perfection in every detail
chapters.description: Swiss Alps, railway tunnels, millimeter precision. Here I learned the meaning of 'quality'. And earned in francs! üí∞

chapters.title: Meeting Kamil
chapters.description: At a construction site in Zurich I met Kamil. After work we talked about how we could do it better, faster, our way. The seed was planted...

chapters.title: The big plan
chapters.description: Return to Poland. With Kamil in a small apartment in Warsaw, sketching a business plan on A4 sheets. Pizza, coffee and big dreams. 'Maybe we should try?'

chapters.title: SteelFlow Systems - birth of the company
chapters.description: Business registration. First workshop rented. First welder bought (used, but working!). We're in business!

chapters.title: First clients
chapters.description: First contract - small structure for local bakery. Then car workshop. References start flowing. Word-of-mouth marketing works!

chapters.title: Family 'competition' üòÑ
chapters.description: Dad noticed we have common clients. 'Son, are you stealing my people?' - we laughed at Sunday dinner. He was actually proud!

chapters.title: Today
chapters.description: Team of 12 people. Modern workshop. ISO certificates. Projects throughout Poland. From a small workshop to a company building the future with steel.

footer.aboutText: SteelFlow Systems - Professional welding and steel construction for years on the market.
